title: Location, Community, Quality Living. It Starts Here! Apply today!
posting_body: We are among the TOP Apartments in the State and the Nation for Online Reputation!
Park 20 scored 97/100, charging past the national average of 61.6 out of 234,000 properties in the nation!
Call us and we would be happy to walk you through a video tour and show you around.
Or come in for a Self-Guided tour!
Reserve and take your new home off the market by stopping by the Leasing Office.
Walk-Ins are welcome or scheduled appointments.
Park20 is recognized as one of the most exciting communities in San Mateo.
Hayward Park and Hillsdale Caltrain Station are just minutes away.
A short drive leads you to Hillsdale Mall and Downtown San Mateo where many local night spots, dining areas, and shopping centers can be enjoyed!
- Gourmet kitchen with Caesar stone countertops
- Recessed LED Lighting in the kitchen
- Tone Zone fitness center with Techno Gym Equipment
- Game Room with billiards, board games
So what are you waiting for?
Time doesn't stop for anyone, so reach out to us and schedule a time to come see your future home today!
M, T, TH, F, S - 8:00 AM - 5:00 PM
Disclaimer: Floor plans and artist’s renderings and actual floor plans may differ from renderings.
Branding elements, floor plans, layout plans, images, names, drawings, perspectives, models, graphics, logos, icons, and other details herein are only indicative.
The Developer/Promoter/Owner reserves the right to change all or any of them.
All room dimensions are approximate only and may or may not include square balcony feet in total square footage.
Prices and availability are subject to change.
Prices may vary based on the move-in date and lease terms.

Park 20 apartments do not condone any sort of discriminatory actions and we do not prohibit people based on race, color, religion, sex, gender, gender identity, gender expression, sexual orientation, marital status, national origin, ancestry, familial status, source of income, disability, or genetic information.
